final_answer:
The humor in this image arises from the juxtaposition of a sleek and elegant car interior with a relaxed and stylish woman on the left side, labeled "YES," against a cramped and uncomfortable scene on the right side with stick figures labeled "BUT."

The left side presents an idealized image of car luxury, often used in advertisements to attract buyers. The woman sitting comfortably in high heels epitomizes sophistication and comfort.

In contrast, the right side humorously illustrates the reality that passengers, especially in the back seat, can face discomfort—depicted by stick figures shivering and squeezed into tight spaces. This contrast between expectation and reality highlights the satirical commentary on how car advertisements can be misleading regarding passenger comfort, making the image funny.
